title: Neeko still one shotting with only Q.
body:
Watching NightBlue match on YouTube. His Neeko hit a 100% health Lux with Q only after missing E and killed her. DH proc'd.

Lux was channeling ult, so she ate the full Q, but that's no excuse for damage to be that high.

replies.body: Yes, let's use a 14/1 Neeko with a 20 stack Mejai's as a bases for balance.  I one shot people with Taric (stun and 2 autos)  when I'm that fed too.

And here we have another example of someone with an insanely strong bias using an example without enough evidence to attempt to support their claim.

That said, abilities like Neeko's Q, Swain's R, Anivia's R, Kathus's E, etc. which require you to stand still or be CC'd to do their full damage should definitely kill a charging Lux who decided to ult within range of enemies who could kill her.
Another low mmr idiot with no game knowledge mindlessly raging on the league forums.

There's actually a load screen tip about this sort of thing.

> Champions are most vulnerable to attack when they are in the middle of an action, like attacking a Minion.

Neeko attacked at the proper time.
Can there be a filter where anything referencing nightblue on the gameplay boards gets automatically deleted?
Wukong still one shotting with only r and no counterplay smh
Full Q duration for all 3 is like 2 seconds. Literally any CC will get you smacked by all 3.
